title: Prediction: Nvidia Stock Will Soar in the Second Half of 2025, Thanks to This Incredible News From Microsoft and Meta Platforms
text: Nvidia (NVDA -0.82%) has been the poster child for the AI revolution, with the stock on a marathon that has increased its stock price by more than 1,000% since the dawn of artificial intelligence (AI) in early 2023. In recent months, however, investors have been more circumspect, plagued by a moratorium on AI chip sales to China and the potential impact of broad-based tariffs on the economic landscape.

title: Tech Giants Report: AMZN Stumbles, AAPL Impresses, META Surprises, MSFT Soars

title: Russia's FSB targets foreign embassies in Moscow in cyber espionage campaign, Microsoft says
text: One of the Russian government's premier cyber espionage units is deploying malware against embassies and diplomatic organizations in Moscow by leveraging local internet service providers, Microsoft said on Thursday.

title: Microsoft: Blockbuster Quarter Presents A Golden Opportunity For Profit-Booking
text: Microsoft delivered a blowout Q4, with Azure's explosive 39% growth and strong AI traction driving top- and bottom-line beats. AI investments are paying off, as Fabric, Foundry, and Copilot gain rapid adoption, positioning Microsoft for future growth beyond Azure. Quantitative models (ARIMA and Prophet), however, project subdued EPS growth, and current valuation suggests the stock is marginally overvalued.

title: Microsoft ends tradition of naming competitors in regulatory filings

title: Microsoft: Massive Cloud Upswing
text: Microsoft Corporation delivered strong Q4 results, driven by 26% Y/Y growth in Intelligent Cloud and robust free cash flow, sending shares up over 8% in the after-hours market. I remain bullish on Microsoft due to its leading Cloud position, accelerating AI CapEx, and ability to translate top-line growth into higher free cash flow. Microsoft's Azure has put the Cloud company on a $100B annual free cash flow run-rate.

title: Microsoft and Amazon face fresh UK scrutiny over 70% cloud dominance
text: Britain's competition regulator is set to deepen its probe into the UK cloud services market, targeting Microsoft and Amazon over their combined dominance in the infrastructure-as-a-service (IaaS) sector.

title: BlinkOps Announces Key Collaboration With Microsoft Sentinel to Provide Agentic Workflow Automation for Security Teams
text: AUSTIN, Texas--(BUSINESS WIRE)--BlinkOps, the Agentic Security Automation Platform, today announced its expanded collaboration with Microsoft through a new integration with Microsoft Sentinel, available in the Microsoft Azure Marketplace, and its platform as an Azure Cloud Service. Microsoft Sentinel customers can now build and deploy automated agentic and deterministic workflows initiated and orchestrated by BlinkOps, directly in response to Microsoft Sentinel signals such as alerts and incide.

title: JEPQ: Volatility Collapses Post Microsoft, Meta Earnings (Rating Downgrade)

title: MSFT, META Lead Nasdaq Rally; FOMC Fallout and Fed's Next Steps
text: Sam Vadas and Diane King Hall kick off Thursday's coverage from the NYSE as investors react to two huge earnings beats from Microsoft (MSFT) and Meta (META). Microsoft's surge has the company on track to surpass a $4 trillion market cap valuation.

title: Nasdaq set for rip-roaring start as Meta and Microsoft blow past earnings forecasts
text: Wall Street is set for a rip-roaring start on Thursday, following earnings from Microsoft and Meta overnight that both smashed past expectations.   Led by an 11% premarket gain for the Instagram owner and 8% for the Windows operating system developer, Nasdaq 100 futures were up 1.2% and the S&P 500 rose 0.8%, while Dow Jones futures are up 0.2%.

title: Dominance of Amazon and Microsoft in cloud harming competition, UK says
text: Amazon and Microsoft's dominant position in cloud computing has an adverse effect on competition, exacerbated by technical and commercial barriers to switching, an inquiry group from Britain's antitrust regulator said.

title: Microsoft and Amazon are hurting cloud competition, UK regulator finds
text: Britain's competition regulator called for a probe into Microsoft and Amazon's cloud market dominance under the country's strict new tech rules.

title: Meta and Microsoft Keep Their License to Spend

title: Microsoft poised for $4 trillion valuation after solid results
text: Microsoft is set to soar past $4 trillion in market valuation for the first time on Thursday, as a burst of investor confidence in its booming Azure cloud division helps the tech behemoth become the second company after Nvidia to surpass the milestone.

title: Microsoft's annual cloud revenue hits $75B, profit beats expectations
text: Microsoft said Wednesday that annual revenue for its flagship Azure cloud computing platform has surpassed $75 billion, up 34% from a year earlier.

title: Meet the Unstoppable Stock That Could Join Nvidia, Microsoft, and Apple in the $3 Trillion Club
text: The U.S. is home to nine companies with market capitalizations of $1 trillion or more, but only three have surpassed the ultra-exclusive $3 trillion milestone:
